title: Ben Carson Proposes Ending Police Violence Against Black Men by Giving All Black Men Guns
text: "The only way to stop a bad cop with a gun is with a good Black man with a gun," says GOP presidential hopeful to stunned audience. After enduring blistering attacks regarding his statement that The Holocaust could have been avoided if
